Reviews.Title: i love this package deal!!
Reviews.Author: Sky
Reviews.Content: I was looking for simple and good camera system, and i found SDS-P5101N and gave it a try. When i got my system and try it everything working right out of box and the live view was good as well. Also the internet connection for remote viewing was really stable not like other system i was using before. The only down side is that recording quailty is not good as live view, but not enough to take a star away.

Reviews.Title: SUPER QUALITY AND EASY INSTALLATION !!!!
Reviews.Author: zerobase
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase and you will be too. I have already recommended this product to several of my colleagues.This system was priced right and the ratings were good so I purchased it. Much to my surprise, the installation was extremely easy. The technology is superior to other products I purchased in the past.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SYSTEM, LARGE STORAGE 1TB ENOUGH! LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: RYAN
Reviews.Content: The 1 tb this system has is more than enough and I don't have to backup footage as often than my last system. This system is protecting one of my businesses now, and I'm getting another.

Reviews.Title: Works great. Good deal!
Reviews.Author: Victoria L
Reviews.Content: It is such a nice deal.I can't believe this is a refurbished product.It seems just brand new!After finishing my installation job, it seems the quality of those domes cameras are much higher.Highly recommended.
